thread.title: Blackstone nears deal to buy Stuyvesant Town for $5.3 billion: source
thread.title_full: Blackstone nears deal to buy Stuyvesant Town for $5.3 billion: source | Reuters

author: Greg Roumeliotis
title: Blackstone nears deal to buy Stuyvesant Town for $5.3 billion: source
text:
Blackstone Group LP ( BX.N ) is nearing a deal to acquire Manhattan's Stuyvesant Town-Peter Cooper Village apartment complex for around $5.3 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter who was not authorized to discuss it publicly.
Blackstone declined to comment on Monday.
(Reporting by Gregory Roumeliotis in New York and Rishika Sadam in Bengaluru)
